prompts.prompt: Create a high-conversion ecommerce square thumbnail (1080x1080) featuring ONLY the 'Tenis Barbara' white platform sneakers for women. Photorealistic studio product shot: a pair of white platform sneakers with thick XL sole and lace-up closure, synthetic upper, clean white color. Hero product large (fills ~70% of frame), sharp focus, crisp edges, realistic shadows. Angle emphasis: visible thick platform sole (XL) and comfort cue for memory foam via subtle visual metaphor (soft gradient cushion under insole area, without adding extra objects that change product). Background: bright light-gray to white seamless gradient, high contrast. Add subtle floor reflection. Lighting: softbox key + rim light to define sole thickness. Composition leaves clear negative space top-left for headline and bottom corners for badges. No logos, no people, no extra footwear models.

style.badge: rounded sticker, solid color, high contrast
rounded sticker, slightly smaller than 'Envío gratis', high contrast

composition_rules.focus: Product must be the largest and sharpest element; emphasize the XL platform sole thickness with a 3/4 angle; keep laces and sole texture crisp.
composition_rules.text_legibility: All text must sit on clean negative space; maintain 10% safe margins; ensure contrast ratio high; avoid placing text over detailed shoe areas.

prompts.negative_prompt: watermark, brand logo, recognizable brand marks, copyrighted characters, faces, people, hands, feet wearing shoes, busy background, clutter, extra products, different shoe model, high heel, sandals, boots, incorrect color (non-white), text artifacts, misspelled Spanish, low resolution, blur, motion blur, overexposure, harsh glare, noisy image, AI distortions, deformed laces, duplicated soles, unrealistic proportions
